topicTitle: Re: Oh man, brushed my dogs hair

posts.postText: My pants were literally COVERED in fur, had to change, then flop them outside to get most of it off

not to mention hes a father at 1 year
Not all of us are furrys bro, I dont have anything against them, but i dont like white fur on my black sweatpants

But at least she's cute :D
